abstract: The Walt Disney Company will re-brand Toon Disney as Disney XD, “a cable channel that will target boys,” next February.
snippet: The Walt Disney Company will re-brand Toon Disney as Disney XD, “a cable channel that will target boys,” next February.
lead_paragraph: The Walt Disney Company will re-brand Toon Disney as Disney XD, “a cable channel that will target boys,” next February, the Los Angeles Times reports.

headline.main: Disney Rebrands Cartoon Network For Boys

abstract: The Walt Disney Co. on Thursday detailed some of the programs that will make up Disney XD, a retooled version of the Toon Disney cable channel that will debut next February.
lead_paragraph: The Walt Disney Co. on Thursday detailed some of the programs that will make up Disney XD, a retooled version of the Toon Disney cable channel that will debut next February.

headline.main: Miley Cyrus for Boys? Disney Hopes So.
